name: Kelley et ux. v. Belle et ux., Appellants

judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
parties: Kelley et ux. v. Belle et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert E. Woodside, with him Stanley G. Stroup, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Kelley et ux. v. Belle et ux., Appellants.
Argued April 28, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Robert 8. Glass, for appellants.
Robert E. Woodside, with him Stanley G. Stroup, for appellees.
December 20, 1971:
